analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naajjhattiko
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham ajjhattikam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na ajjhattikaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham ajjhattikam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na ajjhattikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham ajjhattikam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naajjhattiko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naajjhattiko
analyzed: paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na ajjhattikaḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na ajjhattikaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha. Ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekādasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekādasa.
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham bāhiram dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na bāhiraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekādasa ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate ekādasa
